title: Cant Login

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: This keeps showing up, and the site doesnt say theres anything wrong with the client

replies.body: I still can't log in? Can someone help me ???????

Still have issue even after swapping regions (russia) and letting download, anyone else found a fix?

edit - tried a full reinstall of client as well, no luck
I did it as well, but nothing helped.

Let me know in a reply to this comment if any of you fellows are still having issues getting logged in. I'm not seeing any current server issues, but I will be researching to see what happened to cause this earlier today!
LOL, I tried a lot of times, but still can't log in.
Found a fix, swap regions (i did russia and it worked, but oceania didnt) let the patch run and then try to log in again and it works :)

> [{quoted}](name=dolphinos,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OUTExxue,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-07-02T18:17:53.940+0000)
>
> Found a fix, swap regions (i did russia and it worked, but oceania didnt) let the patch run and then try to log in again and it works :)

Thanks, this worked for me too, using Russia
I just made a thread about this too. So it looks like it's not only me. Perhaps behind the scenes maintenance?
I'm still unable to log in? whats the problem with this now
Same for me, but the forum login was down as well. Everything is working fine for me now though.
Ok i think mine just fixed itself, i logged in. Didnt do anything on my side. They may have fixed it.

I have the same problem hopefully sombody figures out how to solve it :( https://gyazo.com/66cedc208988500db172aad0cef332da

whats wierd is that im able to ping the league ip adress so i can talk to their servers but cannot log in https://gyazo.com/b9a85c5ba48334f2bf7673df8cc5af2c
This also. I was playing a couple of hours ago. Internet connection is fine, nothing changed about my computer, didn't shut it down or restart it since I last played.
